name: E-Cell System version 4
tagline: A multi-algorithm, multi-timescale, multi-spatial-representation biochemical simulation environment
body:
# Hello E-Cell4

E-Cell System is, a software platform for modeling, simulation and analysis of complex, heterogeneous and multi-scale systems like the cell.

```python
from ecell4 import *

with reaction_rules():
    A + B == C | (0.01, 0.3)

run_simulation(10, {'A': 60, 'B': 60}, solver='gillespie')
```

![gillespie](https://github.com/ecell/ecell4/blob/master/docs/images/intro_31_0.png)

### [Installation and usage](http://ecell4.readthedocs.org/en/latest/installation.html)

### [Documentation](http://ecell4.readthedocs.org)

### [Help](https://gitter.im/ecell/ecell4)
